analysis.key_quote: Trumps blatant attempts to overthrow democracy and turn federal employees into political appointees who must be “loyal” to him is yet another one of his efforts to become, effectively, king.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization and loyalty to the president, which inherently opposes the idea of reclassifying career civil servants into a more politically influenced role.
